I will make free channel art or profile pic for people, just comment how you want to get them given to you here is some examples of what i could make or better

profile pic
file:///Users/19hawh/Desktop/%20good%20logo.jpg

channel art

also comment full detail of what you would like so i know what to do

And if you enjoyed your channel art/profile picture, clicking the subscribe button means so much and would be a great way to show your appreciation!
youtube channel below
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCVCk3iskzQ6zKP85VYTZOoA
